## Central limit theorem

```{r}
nsims <- 1000
n <- 20

x <- map_dbl(1:nsims, ~ mean(runif(n, 0, 1)))

x <- map_dbl(1:nsims, ~ mean(rexp(n, 1)))

# qqnorm(x); qqline(x)

car::qqPlot(x)

normal.density <- function(t) dnorm(t, mean(x), sqrt(var(x)))

curve(normal.density, col = "blue", xlim = c(min(x), max(x)))

lines(density(x))
```
